no_bots_created_message: Get started by creating your first automated trading bot.
strategy_dca_description: Invests a fixed amount of money at regular intervals, regardless of the price.
strategy_grid_description: Places a series of buy and sell orders within a defined price range, creating a grid of orders.
strategy_momentum_description: Capitalizes on the continuance of existing market trends by taking long or short positions.
strategy_trailing_stop_description: Sets a stop-loss order that adjusts automatically as the price moves in your favor, locking in profits.
strategy_scalping_description: Attempts to make numerous small profits on minor price changes. High frequency, low margin.
strategy_ma_crossover_description: Generates buy/sell signals when a short-term moving average crosses above or below a long-term moving average.
tooltip_param_investment_amount: The amount of USDT to invest in each purchase.
tooltip_param_frequency: How often the bot should make a purchase.
tooltip_param_lower_price: The bottom of the price range for the grid.
tooltip_param_upper_price: The top of the price range for the grid.
tooltip_param_grid_number: The number of individual buy/sell levels within the grid.
tooltip_param_take_profit: The percentage gain at which to close a position for profit.
tooltip_param_stop_loss: The percentage loss at which to close a position to prevent further losses.
tooltip_param_trail_percentage: The percentage below the peak price at which the stop-loss order will trigger.
tooltip_param_initial_amount: The amount to use for the initial entry trade.
tooltip_param_profit_target: The small percentage gain (e.g., 0.5%) at which to close each trade.
tooltip_param_trade_amount: The fixed amount of USDT to use for each individual scalping trade.
tooltip_param_short_window: The number of periods for the faster, short-term moving average (e.g., 9).
tooltip_param_long_window: The number of periods for the slower, long-term moving average (e.g., 21).
tooltip_param_trade_amount_crossover: The amount of USDT to use for each trade triggered by a crossover.
notification_ai_suggestion_unsupported_m: AI suggested an unsupported strategy: '{{strategyName}}'. Please configure manually.
notification_ai_suggestion_api_error_mes: Could not fetch a suggestion from the AI.
gemini_api_key_required_message: Your Gemini API Key is required. Please set it in the Settings page.
sentiment_load_error: Failed to load sentiment. Please try again.
fetch_sentiment_description: Analyze the current market sentiment for the selected pair using AI.
news_load_error: Failed to load news. Please try again.
fetch_news_description: Fetch the latest news and analysis for the selected pair using Google Search.
gemini_api_key_placeholder: Enter your Google AI Studio API key
gemini_api_key_message: This key is used for AI-powered features like strategy suggestions and market analysis. It is stored securely in your browser's local storage.
notification_gemini_key_required_title: Gemini API Key cannot be empty
settings_use_real_api_tooltip: This attempts a real connection using the 'ccxt' library. It will only work in a local environment where 'npm install ccxt' has been run. In this online editor, it will fail and show instructions.
notification_ccxt_missing_message: This feature requires the 'ccxt' library. Please run 'npm install ccxt' in your local project setup to enable live exchange connections.
notification_cors_proxy_activation_messa: Action required. See the persistent alert on the Settings page for instructions on how to activate the proxy.
proxy_activation_required_p1: The free proxy server needs activation. Please
proxy_activation_required_p2: , click the button to request access, then return here and try connecting again.
notification_geo_restriction_message: The connection to {{exchangeName}} was blocked due to geographic restrictions. The API proxy server is likely in a location (e.g., the USA) where the exchange's services are limited.
reports_chart_placeholder: Chart data will be available soon.
reports_table_placeholder: Performance data will be available soon.
reports_best_worst_trades_placeholder: Trade data will be available soon.
backtesting_placeholder: The backtesting module is under development. You will soon be able to test your strategies against historical data here.
log_connection_failed: Connection to {{exchangeName}} failed. Please verify API keys and network connection. Details: {{error}}
log_connection_failed_invalid_keys: Connection to {{exchangeName}} failed: The provided API keys are invalid. Please double-check them.
log_connection_failed_ccxt: Real connection to {{exchangeName}} failed: The 'ccxt' library is not available in this environment.
log_connection_failed_cors_proxy: Connection to {{exchangeName}} failed: The CORS proxy requires activation. The user has been notified.
log_connection_failed_geo_restricted: Connection to {{exchangeName}} failed: The API proxy is in a geo-restricted location.
log_gemini_key_missing_on_save: Save API keys failed: Gemini API Key field was empty.
log_connect_attempt_missing_keys: Connection blocked: Exchange API Key and Secret must be provided before connecting.
log_data_refreshed: Refreshed account balance and trades from {{exchangeName}}.
notification_invalid_api_keys_message: Connection failed. The API keys for {{exchangeName}} appear to be invalid. Please check them and try again.
welcome_back_notification: Welcome back! Your personal data has been loaded.
validation_upper_gt_lower: Upper price must be greater than lower price.
validation_grid_range: Please enter a whole number between 2 and 200.
validation_percentage_range_tp: Please enter a percentage between 0 and 500.
validation_percentage_range_sl: Stop Loss must be a positive percentage, up to 100.
validation_tp_gt_sl: Take Profit must be greater than Stop Loss.
validation_trail_percentage_range: Trail percentage must be between 0.1% and 50%.
validation_profit_target_range: Profit target must be between 0.01% and 10%.
validation_ma_window_range: Window must be a whole number between 2 and 200.
validation_long_gt_short: Long window must be greater than short window.
